actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to issue to the Pat Harrison Waterway District a long-term special use permit to develop approximately 8,307 acres of National Forest System land within the Bienville National Forests in Mississippi, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mid-Mississippi Conservation, Recreation and Development Act of 2017

summary.text:
Mid-Mississippi Conservation, Recreation and Development Act of 2017

 This bill directs the Department of Agriculture to issue to the Pat Harrison Waterway District a long-term special use permit to develop approximately 8,307 acres of specified National Forest System land within the Bienville National Forests of Mississippi for public purposes only.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to issue to the Pat Harrison Waterway District a long-term special use permit to develop approximately 8,307 acres of National Forest System land within the Bienville National Forests in Mississippi, and for other purposes.
